import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import DOMPurify from "dompurify" import aboutImg from '../img/about.png'; export const About = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchData = async ()=>{ try{ const res = await axios.get(`/about/`) setPosts(res.data) }catch(err){ console.log(err) } } fetchData() }) return (

About

{posts.map((post)=>(post.class==="about" &&

{post.about}

))}
{posts.map((post)=>(post.class==="h6" &&
{post.about}
{post.description}
))}
បច្ចុប្បន្នភាព
{posts.map((post)=>(post.class==="feature" &&

{post.about}

{post.description}

))}
{/* SECTIONS */}
{posts.map((post)=>( post.class === "section" &&
{post.about}
{post.description}
))}
) } export default About
